overview:
As Full Stack AI developer with expertise in machine learning, I specialize in developing autonomous systems and artificial intelligence.
My focus is on perception, decision-making, and control. I am fluent in Python and C++, and have worked on a variety of projects as a consultant, helping clients achieve their goals.
Especially dedicated in complex back-end development including web-scraping, OpenAI, Chatbot, streaming, webRTC, CI/CD, etc.
Have high Problem-solving skills, good communication skills, fast learning ability.
Be proficient in several programming languages and cloud, such as Google, AWS.

description: Designed and executed well-engineered, easy-to-maintain, reliable, and bug - free code for various company applications in collaboration with other AI engineers, data scientists, programmers, and software personnel.
Collaborated on the deployment and commercialization of machine learning algorithms for 3 projects including text recognition, face recognition and image classification.
Implemented text recognition from images using transformer Model and upgraded that project to recognize the handwritten text recognition.
Designed new face recognition model for masked faces and developed the project using that model.
Developed a Natural Language Processing System that increased customer satisfaction ratings by 30% on Integrate.ai Virtual assistant platform.
Redesigned the architecture of AI-driven chatbot, leading to a 40% reduction in response time.
Developed a frontend for decentralized data storage using Next.js, Tailwind CSS and Turbo.
Developed a WordPress plugin for wallet integration.
Developed dashboard template project using tailwind css and next.js framework.
Developed frontend for betting site using React.
Developed backend for automatic generation telegram bot using telethon, appium, selenium and Google cloud.
Developed frontend demo project using react and tailwind css.
Master web scraping using puppeteer, selenium, beautifulsoup, scrapingbee and zenrows.
Developed telegram bot as friend in life, including voice feature.
